message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product.  Given its potential value, I'm asking for $2000000.  I believe this price reflects its worth while still leaving room for negotiation. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. While I appreciate the uniqueness of the item, I believe $1500000 would be a fair price for us both. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer. While I value your interest, $1500000 is significantly below what this product is worth to me.  I'm willing to come down to $1750000,  which is a compromise that reflects the product's unique value.  Let's see if we can reach a mutually agreeable price.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value you place on the product. I am willing to meet you halfway at $1625000. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
